hahaha i hate the meta and im playing champs like Darius and ad vi jg and top i hate the tank meta 70% or bards just get 40% cdr and ult to get you killed or to let them get away so shut up i just don't like bard cose a lot of players play him just to troll he is a good champ yes but wen players troll with him he is not good do you disagree 
tips hat{{item:3089}}

no champion is at their full potential when their only use for trolling. Every champ in this game has the ability to fill whatever role they want if a champ is played right. Bard can actually be really strong when played correctly letting team mates survive in situations they wouldn't and opens up the possibility for surprise engages when the enemy is not expecting it and after bard ult cannot stop it. He also can stun two people in fight really easily. But besides this, it is true he does not have as much teamfight potential as other champs but excels more in early-mid game with heals and skirmish 2-people stuns for example, the 2v2 bot lane which he is most prominently used in.
That is a brief overview of my opinion, ask if you wish for more explaining.
